name: Escape From The Tower of Time
name_original: Escape From The Tower of Time
description:
You are trapped in the Tower of Time! Every 60 seconds you are sent back in time to the beginning of the tower, thankfully someone left some conveniently spaced time anchors lying around to serve as plot dev- uhh.. checkpoints. Reaching the next anchors before your time runs out, and eventually you may find an exit!

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

Made for Ludum Dare 47.
